mapper.sql: id, name, room_count, hotel_id, desc, rack_rate, deposit, weekend_fare_enable, weekend_fare, mark_modified, breakfast_enable, breakfast_quantity, created_by, created_at, updated_by, updated_at
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.hotel_id hotelId, a.`name`, a.rack_rate rackRate, a.`desc`, a.deposit,a.weekend_fare_enable weekendFareEnable, a.weekend_fare weekendFare, a.breakfast_enable breakfastEnable, a.breakfast_quantity breakfastQuantity, a.room_count roomCount, b.price calenderPrice, IFNULL(SUM(c.number), 0) orderCount FROM t_room_category a
LEFT JOIN (SELECT category_id, price FROM t_room_calendar WHERE NOW() >= begin_time AND NOW() <= end_time) b ON a.id = b.category_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT category_id, number FROM t_order_room WHERE #{param.roomInTime} >= room_in_time AND #{param.roomOutTime} <= room_out_time) c ON a.id = c.category_id
WHERE a.hotel_id = #{hotelId} AND a.mark_modified = 0
AND a.id = #{param.categoryId}
GROUP BY a.id
